logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { source: "AMQ", message: "Person named " ++ (vars.person."first-name" default "NONAME") ++ " received from the queue.", operation: vars.operation }]

logger.doc:name: Log NO ACTION
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { source: "AMQ", message: "Person named " ++ (vars.person."first-name" default "") ++ " no action taken to ack but received succesfully" }]

logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { source: "AMQ", message: "Person named " ++ (vars.person."first-name" default "NONAME") ++ " rejected." }]

logger.doc:name: Log ERROR
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { source: "AMQ", message: "Person named " ++ (vars.person."first-name" default "NONAME") ++ " received with errors." }]

logger.doc:name: Log DELAY
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { source: "RMQ", message: "Person named " ++ (vars.person."first-name" default "NONAME") ++ " received for delayed insertion.", delay: vars.delay }]

logger.doc:name: Log FINISH DELAYED
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { source: "RMQ", message: "Person named " ++ (vars.person."first-name" default "NONAME") ++ " received for delayed insertion.", delay: vars.delay }]

logger.doc:name: Log DEFAULT(EVERYTHING ELSE)
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { source: "AMQ", message: "Person named " ++ (vars.person."first-name" default "") ++ " accepted succesfully" }]

logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { source: "AMQ", message: "Pooling ended.", details: error.description default "NODESCRIPTION" }]

logger.doc:name: Log REJECT by ERROR THROWN
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { source: "AMQ", message: "Message Rejected by Exhaustion of Error Thrown.", details: error.description default "NODESCRIPTION" }]

logger.doc:name: Log ERROR THROWN
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { source: "AMQ", message: "Person named " ++ (vars.person."first-name" default "NONAME") ++ " thrown an error.", details: error.description default "NODESCRIPTION" }]
